title: Part (a)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

All four criteria in part (a) are achieved independently.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes three of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes all four of the criteria below.

title: Part (b)
stimulusHtml:
elect a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

General Considerations

Both the identification of the quantity as 5 million cases of soft drinks and the explanation are required to receive the 1 point.

The response should recognize that the price ceiling is not effective or binding because the price ceiling is set above the equilibrium price.
descriptions:
The response does not state that the quantity exchanged in the market is
5 million cases of soft drinks (see graph below) and/or explain that the price ceiling is not effective or binding because the price ceiling is set above the equilibrium price.

The response states that the quantity exchanged in the market is 5 million cases of soft drinks (see graph below) and explains that the price ceiling is not effective or binding because the price ceiling is set above the equilibrium price.
